org.modelio.api.modelio.picking

Interface IPickingSession


  • public interface IPickingSession

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hoverElement(MObject target)
      Ask the picking client whether it accepts the given element.
      void selectElement(MObject target)
      Tell the picking client to pick the given element.

    • Method Detail

      • hoverElement

        boolean hoverElement(MObject target)
        Ask the picking client whether it accepts the given element.
        This method is called by a picking provider when the mouse is moved on a model element.
        Parameters:
        target - The model element
        Returns:
        true if the element is accepted, false in the other case

      • selectElement

        void selectElement(MObject target)
        Tell the picking client to pick the given element.
        This method is called by a picking provider when the user click on a model element.
        The picking client may either accept the element and close the picking session, or refuse it.
        Parameters:
        target - The model element
